description: Mentioned only in passing by Audsley, who does not define it. From other uses of the suffix bass in German stop names, we can infer that this name is used for a Gedeckt that appears in the pedal. Examples Numerous examples in Osiris[1] at 8' and 16' pitch, all in pedal divisions. Bibliography Audsley[1]: Offenbass. FOOTER Original site compiled by Edward L. Stauff. For educational use only.
